00146 #define M_2PI (2*M_PI)
00147 #define M_PI2 (M_PI*M_PI)
00148 
00149 inline static double dabs(double x) { if (x<0) return -x; else return x; };
00150

00152 static double lalpha0;
00153 static double lbeta0;
00154 static double lgamma0;
00155 
00156 inline static double mod2pi(double a) { return (a - floor(a/M_2PI)*M_2PI); }
00157 
00158 inline static double diffang(double a, double b)
00159 {
00160   return (M_PI - dabs(M_PI-mod2pi(a-b)));
00161 }
00162 
00163 int orientationinverted(double alpha, double beta, double gamma,
00164                         double lalpha, double lbeta, double lgamma)
00165 {
00166   // if we are away from beta = pi/2 only look at beta
00167   // if we are close to beta = pi/2 also look at alpha
00168   if ((diffang(beta, M_PI_2) > 0.1 && 
00169        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta) < diffang(beta, lbeta)) ||
00170       (diffang(beta, M_PI_2) <= 0.1 && 
00171        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha-M_PI, lalpha) < 
00172        diffang(beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha, lalpha)))
00173     return 1;
00174   else
00175     return 0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 void invertangles(double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00180 {
00181   *alpha = mod2pi(*alpha - M_PI);
00182   *beta  = M_PI - *beta;
00183   *gamma = mod2pi(M_PI - *gamma);
00184 }
00185 #endif

00188 static complex double expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* c)
00189 {
00190   int i,j;
00191   complex double res = 0.0;
00192 
00193   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00194     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00195       res += conj(c[i])*A[i+j*n]*c[j];
00196 
00197   return res;
00198 }

00201 // perform K-mixing calculation and sort out "good" states
00202 
00203 static int cmpmerit(void* ap, void* bp) 
00204 {
00205   double a=*(double*) ap;
00206   double b=*(double*) bp;
00207   
00208   return (a<=b ? (a<b ? 1 : 0) : -1);
00209 }
00210 
00211 void kmixingstates(complex double* H, complex double* N, int j, double thresh, 
00212                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00213 {
00214   complex double e[j+1];
00215   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00216   int d;
00217 
00218   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00219 
00220   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00221   // see sortEigenstates
00222 
00223   double norm[d];
00224   int i, k, l;
00225 
00226   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00227       norm[i] = 0.0;
00228       for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00229         for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00230           norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00231     }
00232 
00233   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00234   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00235     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00236 
00237   // merits
00238 
00239   struct merit {
00240     double val;
00241     int idx;
00242   } merits[d];
00243 
00244   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00245     merits[i].idx = i;
00246     if (creal(norm[i]) < MINNORMKMIX*maxnorm)
00247       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00248     else
00249       merits[i].val = -creal(e[i]);
00250   }
00251 
00252   // sort according to merits value
00253   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00254 
00255   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00256 
00257   i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
00258     egood[i] = -merits[i].val;
00259     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00260       Vgood[k+i*(j+1)] = V[k+merits[i].idx*(j+1)];
00261     i++;
00262   }
00263   *ngood = i;
00264 
00265 }

00268 // calculate overlap of first ngood multiconfig states with subspace defined by imin..imax
00269 #define INVTHRESH 1e-9
00270 void calcsubspaceoverlap(int n, complex double* N, complex double* V,
00271                          int ngood,
00272                          int imin, int imax,
00273                          double* ovl)
00274 {
00275   if (ngood == 0 || imin==imax) return;
00276 
00277   int nsub=imax-imin;
00278   complex double Nsub[nsub*nsub], Osub[nsub*nsub];
00279 
00280   int i,j;
00281   for (j=0; j<nsub; j++)
00282     for (i=0; i<nsub; i++)
00283       Nsub[i+j*nsub] = N[(i+imin)+(j+imin)*n];
00284 
00285   pseudoinverse(Nsub, Osub, nsub, INVTHRESH);
00286 
00287   int alpha, k,l;
00288   double ovlap, norm;
00289 
00290   for (alpha=0; alpha<ngood; alpha++) {
00291     ovlap = 0.0;
00292     norm = 0.0;
00293     for (l=0; l<n; l++)
00294       for (k=0; k<n; k++) {
00295         norm += conj(V[k+alpha*n])*N[k+l*n]*V[l+alpha*n];
00296         for (j=0; j<nsub; j++)
00297           for (i=0; i<nsub; i++) {
00298             ovlap += conj(V[k+alpha*n])*N[k+(i+imin)*n]*Osub[i+j*nsub]*N[(j+imin)+l*n]*V[l+alpha*n];
00299           }
00300       }
00301     ovl[alpha] = ovlap/norm;
00302   }
00303 }

00306 // copy hermitean conjugate of matrix A into B
00307 void hermiteancopy(int j, const complex double* A, complex double* B)
00308 {
00309   int k,kp;
00310 
00311   for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
00312     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00313       B[k+kp*(j+1)] = conj(A[kp+k*(j+1)]);
00314 }

00318 #ifndef MPI
00319 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00320                                     const Interaction* Int,
00321                                     int j, int par, 
00322                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00323                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00324 {
00325   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00326   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00327 
00328   int nang = angpara->n;
00329 
00330   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00331 
00332   int k,kp;
00333   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00334     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00335       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00336       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00337       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00338     }
00339 
00340   complex double nme, hme, j2me;
00341   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00342 
00343   int i, ip;
00344   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00345     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00346 
00347     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00348 
00349     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00350     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00351       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00352       
00353       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00354       nme = X->ovlap;
00355       calcHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, &hme);
00356       calcConstraintJ2od(Q, Qpp, X, &j2me);
00357 
00358       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00359         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00360           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00361             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
00362           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00363             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
00364           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00365             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
00366         }
00367     }
00368   }
00369 
00370 }
00371 #endif
00372 
00373 #ifdef MPI
00374 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00375                                     const Interaction* Int,
00376                                     int j, int par, 
00377                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00378                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00379 {
00380   int nang = angpara->n;
00381 
00382   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00383 
00384   int k,kp;
00385   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00386     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00387       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00388       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00389       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00390     }
00391    
00392   int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00393   BroadcastTask(&task);
00394 
00395   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00396   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00397 
00398   int todo = nang;
00399   int running=0;
00400   int done=0;
00401   int processor;
00402   MPI_Status status;
00403 
00404   // processor 0 is master
00405   double angle[mpisize][3];
00406   double weight[mpisize];
00407   double projpar[3];
00408   
00409   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00410   int i;
00411   int working[mpisize];
00412   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00413     working[i] = 0;
00414 
00415   complex double hme[2], nme[2], j2me[2];
00416 
00417   int next=0;
00418   while (done<todo) {
00419 
00420     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00421 
00422       // find empty slave
00423       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00424         if (!working[i]) {
00425           processor = i;
00426           break;
00427         }
00428 
00429       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00430 
00431       for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00432         projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00433 
00434       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00435 
00436       working[processor] = 1;
00437       running++;
00438       next++;
00439 
00440     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00441 
00442       MPI_Recv(hme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00443                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00444       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00445 
00446       MPI_Recv(nme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00447                processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00448       MPI_Recv(j2me, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00449                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00450 
00451       complex double w;
00452       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00453         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00454           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00455             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00456 
00457           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(hme[0] + par* hme[1]);
00458           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(nme[0] + par* nme[1]);
00459           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(j2me[0] + par* j2me[1]);
00460         }
00461 
00462       working[processor] = 0;
00463       running--;
00464       done++;
00465     }
00466 
00467   }
00468 
00469   // tell slaves we have finished
00470   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00471   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00472     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00473   }     
00474 
00475 }
00476 #endif
00477 
00478 
00479 #ifndef MPI
00480 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00481                                         const Interaction* Int,
00482                                         int j, int par, 
00483                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00484                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00485                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00486 {
00487   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00488   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00489   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dh;
00490   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dn;
00491   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;
00492 
00493   int nang = angpara->n;
00494 
00495   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00496 
00497   int k,kp;
00498   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00499     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00500       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00501       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00502       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00503       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00504     }
00505 
00506   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00507 
00508   int i, ip;
00509   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00510     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00511 
00512     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00513 
00514     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00515 
00516     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00517       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00518 
00519       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00520       calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X, dX);
00521       calcgradOvlapod(Q, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
00522       dn->val = X->ovlap;
00523       calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, dX, dh);
00524 
00525       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00526         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00527 
00528           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00529             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
00530           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00531             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;
00532 
00533           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00534                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00535           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00536                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00537         }
00538     }
00539   }
00540 
00541 }
00542 #endif
00543 
00544 #ifdef MPI
00545 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00546                                         const Interaction* Int,
00547                                         int j, int par, 
00548                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00549                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00550                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00551 {
00552   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dh;
00553   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dn;
00554 
00555   int nang = angpara->n;
00556 
00557   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00558 
00559   int k,kp;
00560   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00561     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00562       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00563       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00564       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00565       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00566     }
00567 
00568   int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00569   BroadcastTask(&task);
00570 
00571   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00572   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00573 
00574   int todo = nang;
00575   int running=0;
00576   int done=0;
00577   int processor;
00578   MPI_Status status;
00579 
00580   // processor 0 is master
00581   double angle[mpisize][3];
00582   double weight[mpisize];
00583   double projpar[3];
00584   
00585   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00586   int i;
00587   int working[mpisize];
00588   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00589     working[i] = 0;
00590 
00591 
00592   int next=0;
00593   while (done<todo) {
00594 
00595     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00596 
00597       // find empty slave
00598       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00599         if (!working[i]) {
00600           processor = i;
00601           break;
00602         }
00603 
00604       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00605       for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00606         projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00607 
00608       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00609 
00610       working[processor] = 1;
00611       running++;
00612       next++;
00613 
00614     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00615 
00616       // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00617 
00618       complex double w;
00619 
00620       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00621 
00622       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00623 
00624       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00625                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00626 
00627      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00628         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00629           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00630             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00631 
00632           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dh->val;
00633           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2);
00634         }    
00635 
00636       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00637       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00638                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00639 
00640      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00641         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00642           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00643             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00644 
00645           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dh->val;
00646           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*par);
00647         }    
00648 
00649       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00650       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00651                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00652 
00653      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00654         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00655           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00656             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00657 
00658           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dn->val;
00659           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2);
00660         }        
00661 
00662       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00663       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00664                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00665 
00666      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00667         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00668           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00669             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00670 
00671           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dn->val;
00672           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*par);
00673         }        
00674 
00675       working[processor] = 0;
00676       running--;
00677       done++;
00678     }
00679 
00680   }
00681 
00682   // tell slaves we have finished
00683   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00684   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00685     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00686   }     
00687 }
00688 #endif
00689 
00690 
00691 void initWork(int nfix, const SlaterDet* Qfix, 
00692               int j, int par,
00693               angintegrationpara* AngPar,
00694               const Interaction* Int,
00695               const SlaterDet* Q)
00696 {       
00697   int n=nfix+1;
00698 
00699   int a,b;
00700   int k;
00701 
00702   Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00703   Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00704   Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00705   Work.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00706 
00707   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
00708   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
00709   initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
00710   initgradSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.dX);
00711 
00712   Work.dH = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
00713   Work.dN = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
00714   for (b=0; b<n; b++) {
00715     Work.dH[b] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00716     Work.dN[b] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00717     
00718     for (k=0; k<(j+1)*(j+1); k++) {
00719       initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dH[b][k]); 
00720       initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dN[b][k]);
00721     }
00722   }
00723   Work.dh = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00724   Work.dn = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00725 
00726   Work.dhmulti = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00727   Work.dnmulti = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00728 
00729   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dh);
00730   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dn);
00731   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhmulti);
00732   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnmulti);
00733 
00734   Work.V = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
00735   for (a=0; a<n; a++) 
00736     Work.V[a] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00737 
00738   Work.dim = malloc(n*sizeof(int));
00739   
00740   Work.H = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
00741   Work.N = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
00742   Work.J2 = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
00743   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00744     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00745       Work.H[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00746       Work.N[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00747       Work.J2[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00748     }
00749 
00750   // calculate diagonal matrix elements for fix configs
00751   int ia;
00752   for (a=0; a<nfix; a++) {
00753     calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(&Qfix[a], &Qfix[a], Int, j, par, AngPar, 
00754                                    Work.H[a+a*n], Work.N[a+a*n], Work.J2[a+a*n]);
00755 
00756     double efix[j+1];
00757     kmixingstates(Work.H[a+a*n], Work.N[a+a*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
00758                   efix, Work.V[a], &Work.dim[a]);
00759 
00760     for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++)
00761       fprintf(stderr, "Qfix[%d]:  E[%d] = %8.3f MeV\n", a, ia, hbc*efix[ia]);
00762   }
00763 
00764   // calculate upper part of off-diagonal matrix elements for fix configs
00765   for (b=1; b<nfix; b++) {
00766     for (a=0; a<=b; a++) {
00767       calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(&Qfix[a], &Qfix[b], Int, j, par, AngPar, 
00768                                      Work.H[a+b*n], Work.N[a+b*n], Work.J2[a+b*n]);
00769       hermiteancopy(j, Work.H[a+b*n], Work.H[b+a*n]);
00770       hermiteancopy(j, Work.N[a+b*n], Work.N[b+a*n]);
00771     }
00772   }
00773 
00774   // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates
00775 
00776   int i, dimfix=0;
00777 
00778   for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) 
00779     dimfix += Work.dim[i];
00780 
00781   complex double Hfix[dimfix*dimfix], Nfix[dimfix*dimfix];
00782 
00783   int ib, idxa, idxb, kp;
00784   idxb=-1;
00785   for (b=0; b<nfix; b++)
00786     for (ib=0; ib<Work.dim[b]; ib++) {
00787       idxb++;
00788       idxa=-1;
00789       for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
00790         for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++) {
00791           idxa++;
00792       
00793           Hfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] = 0.0;
00794           Nfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] = 0.0;
00795 
00796           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++) 
00797             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00798               Hfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] += 
00799                 conj(Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)])*
00800                 Work.H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
00801                 Work.V[b][kp+ib*(j+1)];
00802 
00803           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++) 
00804             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00805               Nfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] += 
00806                 conj(Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)])*
00807                 Work.N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
00808                 Work.V[b][kp+ib*(j+1)];
00809         }
00810     }   
00811 
00812   // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace
00813   complex double efix[dimfix];
00814   complex double Vfix[dimfix*dimfix];
00815   int dfix;
00816 
00817   generalizedeigensystem(Hfix, Nfix, dimfix, THRESHMULTI, efix, Vfix, &dfix);
00818   sorteigenstates(dimfix, efix, Vfix, dfix);
00819 
00820   // normalize eigenstates
00821   double normfix[dfix];
00822   for (i=0; i<dfix; i++) {
00823     normfix [i] = expect(dimfix, Nfix, &Vfix[i*dimfix]);
00824 
00825     for (idxa=0; idxa<dimfix; idxa++)
00826       Vfix[idxa+i*dimfix] /= sqrt(normfix[i]);
00827   }
00828 
00829   // eigenstates of fix configs
00830   Work.Vo = malloc(dfix*nfix*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00831 
00832   for (i=0; i<dfix; i++) {
00833     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
00834       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00835         Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)] = 0.0;
00836 
00837     idxa=-1;
00838     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
00839       for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++) {
00840         idxa++;
00841 
00842         for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00843           Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)] += Vfix[idxa+i*dimfix]*Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)];
00844     }
00845   }
00846 
00847 }
00848 
00849 // perform multiconfiguration calculation with fixed intrinsic states
00850 // return eigenvalue #ival
00851 
00852 // assumes fix matrix elements to be available in Work
00853 
00854 void calcprojectedHamiltonian(int nfix,
00855                               const SlaterDet* Qfix,
00856                               const SlaterDet* Q,
00857                               const Interaction* Int,
00858                               int j, int par,
00859                               int ifix,
00860                               angintegrationpara* angpara,
00861                               double* eintr, double* emulti)
00862 {
00863   complex double** H = Work.H;
00864   complex double** N = Work.N;
00865   complex double** J2 = Work.J2;
00866   complex double** V = Work.V;
00867   int* dim = Work.dim;
00868 
00869   // Q is intrinsic state to be varied
00870   // orient properly
00871   // then calculate needed matrix elements
00872   // solve eigenvalue problem in smaller subspace spanned by K-mixing eigenstates
00873 
00874   int n = nfix+1;
00875 
00876   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00877   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00878 
00879 #ifdef ORIENTED
00880   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00881 #endif
00882    
00883   complex double hintr, nintr;
00884 
00885   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00886 
00887 #ifdef ORIENTED
00888   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00889   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00890   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
00891     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00892   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00893           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00894   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00895 #endif
00896 
00897   // intrinsic state
00898 
00899   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00900 
00901   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
00902     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00903     *emulti = ENERGYPENALTY;
00904     return;
00905   }
00906 
00907   nintr = X->ovlap;
00908   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00909 
00910   // projected matrix elements, off-diagonals
00911   int i;
00912   for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) {
00913     calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, &Qfix[i], Int, j, par, angpara,
00914                                    H[(n-1)+i*n], N[(n-1)+i*n], J2[(n-1)+i*n]);
00915 
00916     hermiteancopy(j, H[(n-1)+i*n], H[i+(n-1)*n]);
00917     hermiteancopy(j, N[(n-1)+i*n], N[i+(n-1)*n]);
00918     hermiteancopy(j, J2[(n-1)+i*n], J2[i+(n-1)*n]);
00919   }
00920 
00921   // projected matrix elements for Qp
00922   calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
00923                                  H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n]);
00924 
00925   // K-mixing for Qp
00926   double ed[j+1];
00927 
00928   kmixingstates(H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
00929                 ed, V[n-1], &dim[n-1]);
00930 
00931   if (!dim[n-1]) {
00932     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
00933   }
00934 
00936   // dim[n-1] = 1;
00937 
00938   // ovlap of k-mixing states with intrinsic state
00939 
00940   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00941   multcmat(N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N2, j+1);
00942 
00943   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
00944 
00945   for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++) {
00946     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
00947     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
00948     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
00949     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
00950   }
00951 
00952   for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++)
00953     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
00954             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
00955 
00956   // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates
00957   
00958   int dimsub=dim[n-1];
00959   complex double C[ifix][dimsub];
00960 
00961   int idxa, idxb, a, b, k, kp, kpp;
00962 
00963   for (i=0; i<ifix; i++) {
00964 
00965     for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
00966       C[i][idxa] = 0.0;
00967     
00968     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
00969       for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
00970         for (kpp=0; kpp<j+1; kpp++) {
00971 
00972           for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
00973             C[i][idxa] += 
00974               conj(Work.Vo[kp+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)])*
00975               N[a+(n-1)*n][kp+kpp*(j+1)]*
00976               V[n-1][kpp+idxa*(j+1)];
00977         }
00978   }
00979 
00980   complex double W[dimsub][n*(j+1)];
00981 
00982   for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {
00983 
00984     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00985       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00986         W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = 0.0;
00987 
00988     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
00989       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00990         for (i=0; i<ifix; i++)
00991           W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] += -Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)]*C[i][idxa];
00992 
00993     a=n-1;
00994     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00995       W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = V[a][k+idxa*(j+1)];
00996   }
00997 
00998   complex double Hsub[dimsub*dimsub], Nsub[dimsub*dimsub];
00999 
01000   for (idxb=0; idxb<dimsub; idxb++)
01001     for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {
01002 
01003       Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
01004       Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
01005       
01006       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
01007         for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
01008 
01009           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01010             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01011               Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
01012                 conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
01013                 H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
01014                 W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
01015 
01016           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01017             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01018               Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
01019                 conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
01020                 N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
01021                 W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
01022         }
01023     }
01024 
01025   // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace
01026 
01027   complex double esub[dimsub];
01028   complex double Vsub[dimsub*dimsub];
01029   int dsub;
01030 
01031   generalizedeigensystem(Hsub, Nsub, dimsub, THRESHMULTI, esub, Vsub, &dsub);
01032   sorteigenstates(dimsub, esub, Vsub, dsub);
01033 
01034   for (i=0; i<dsub; i++)
01035     fprintf(stderr, "Multiconfig eigenstate %d = %8.3f\n", 
01036             i, hbc*creal(esub[i]));
01037 
01038   // expectation values for first eigenstate
01039   complex double* csub = Vsub;
01040 
01041   complex double hmulti, nmulti;
01042   hmulti = expect(dimsub, Hsub, csub);
01043   nmulti = expect(dimsub, Nsub, csub);
01044 
01045   if (dabs(j2proj[0]/nproj[0] - 0.5*j*(0.5*j+1.0)) > ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION) {
01046     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
01047     *emulti = ENERGYPENALTY;
01048     return;
01049   }
01050 
01051   *eintr = hintr/nintr;
01052   *emulti = creal(hmulti/nmulti);
01053 }
01054 
01055 
01056 
01057 // gradient will be written to Work.dhmulti
01058 
01059 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(int nfix,
01060                                   const SlaterDet* Qfix,
01061                                   const SlaterDet* Q, 
01062                                   const Interaction* Int,
01063                                   int j, int par, 
01064                                   int ifix,
01065                                   angintegrationpara* angpara,
01066                                   double* eintr, double* emulti)
01067 {
01068   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
01069   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
01070   complex double** H = Work.H;
01071   complex double** N = Work.N;
01072   complex double** J2 = Work.J2;
01073   complex double** V = Work.V;
01074   int* dim = Work.dim;
01075   gradSlaterDet** dH = Work.dH;
01076   gradSlaterDet** dN = Work.dN;
01077   gradSlaterDet* dhmulti = Work.dhmulti;
01078   gradSlaterDet* dnmulti = Work.dnmulti;
01079 
01080   int n = nfix+1;
01081 
01082 #ifdef ORIENTED
01083   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
01084 #endif
01085 
01086   int a, b, k, kp;
01087 
01088   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
01089 #ifdef ORIENTED
01090   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01091   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01092   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
01093     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
01094     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
01095   }
01096   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
01097           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
01098   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
01099 
01100   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
01101 #endif
01102 
01103   complex double hintr, nintr;
01104   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
01105   nintr = X->ovlap;
01106   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
01107 
01108   *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);
01109 
01110   // projected matrix elements, off-diagonals
01111   int i;
01112   for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) {
01113     calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, &Qfix[i], Int, j, par, angpara,
01114                                        H[(n-1)+i*n], N[(n-1)+i*n],
01115                                        dH[i], dN[i]);
01116     hermiteancopy(j, H[(n-1)+i*n], H[i+(n-1)*n]);
01117     hermiteancopy(j, N[(n-1)+i*n], N[i+(n-1)*n]);
01118   }
01119 
01120   // projected matrix elements for Qp
01121   calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
01122                                      H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n],
01123                                      dH[n-1], dN[n-1]);
01124 
01125   // K-mixing for Qp
01126   double ed[j+1];
01127 
01128   kmixingstates(H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
01129                 ed, V[n-1], &dim[n-1]);
01130 
01131   if (!dim[n-1]) {
01132     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
01133   }
01134 
01136   // dim[n-1] = 1;
01137 
01138   // ovlap of k-mixing states with intrinsic state
01139 
01140   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
01141   multcmat(N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N2, j+1);
01142 
01143   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
01144 
01145   for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++) {
01146     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
01147     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
01148     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
01149     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
01150   }
01151 
01152   for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++)
01153     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
01154             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
01155 
01156   // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates
01157   
01158   int dimsub=dim[n-1];
01159   complex double C[ifix][dimsub];
01160 
01161   int idxa, idxb, kpp;
01162 
01163   for (i=0; i<ifix; i++) {
01164 
01165     for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
01166       C[i][idxa] = 0.0;
01167     
01168     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
01169       for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01170         for (kpp=0; kpp<j+1; kpp++) {
01171 
01172           for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
01173             C[i][idxa] += 
01174               conj(Work.Vo[kp+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)])*
01175               N[a+(n-1)*n][kp+kpp*(j+1)]*
01176               V[n-1][kpp+idxa*(j+1)];
01177         }
01178   }
01179 
01180   complex double W[dimsub][n*(j+1)];
01181 
01182   for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {
01183 
01184     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
01185       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01186         W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = 0.0;
01187 
01188     for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
01189       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01190         for (i=0; i<ifix; i++)
01191           W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] += -Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)]*C[i][idxa];
01192 
01193     a=n-1;
01194     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01195       W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = V[a][k+idxa*(j+1)];
01196   }
01197 
01198   complex double Hsub[dimsub*dimsub], Nsub[dimsub*dimsub];
01199 
01200   for (idxb=0; idxb<dimsub; idxb++)
01201     for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {
01202 
01203       Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
01204       Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
01205       
01206       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
01207         for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
01208 
01209           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01210             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01211               Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
01212                 conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
01213                 H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
01214                 W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
01215 
01216           for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01217             for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
01218               Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
01219                 conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
01220                 N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
01221                 W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
01222         }
01223     }
01224 
01225   // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace
01226 
01227   complex double esub[dimsub];
01228   complex double Vsub[dimsub*dimsub];
01229   int dsub;
01230 
01231   generalizedeigensystem(Hsub, Nsub, dimsub, THRESHMULTI, esub, Vsub, &dsub);
01232   sorteigenstates(dimsub, esub, Vsub, dsub);
01233 
01234   for (i=0; i<dsub; i++)
01235     fprintf(stderr, "Multiconfig eigenstate %d = %8.3f\n", 
01236             i, hbc*creal(esub[i]));
01237 
01238   // expectation values for first eigenstate
01239   complex double* csub = Vsub;
01240 
01241   complex double hmulti, nmulti;
01242   hmulti = expect(dimsub, Hsub, csub);
01243   nmulti = expect(dimsub, Nsub, csub);
01244 
01245   *emulti = creal(hmulti/nmulti);
01246 
01247   // gradients
01248 
01249   zerogradSlaterDet(dhmulti);
01250   zerogradSlaterDet(dnmulti);
01251 
01252   complex double cak, cbkp;
01253 
01254   for (b=0; b<n; b++) {
01255     a=n-1;
01256   
01257     for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
01258       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++) {
01259 
01260         cak = 0.0; cbkp = 0.0;
01261         for (i=0; i<dimsub; i++) {
01262           cak += csub[i]*W[i][k+a*(j+1)];
01263           cbkp += csub[i]*W[i][kp+b*(j+1)];
01264         }
01265 
01266         addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhmulti, &dH[b][k+kp*(j+1)], conj(cak)*cbkp);
01267         addmulttogradSlaterDet(dnmulti, &dN[b][k+kp*(j+1)], conj(cak)*cbkp);
01268       }
01269   }   
01270 
01271   multgradSlaterDet(dhmulti, 1.0/nmulti);
01272   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhmulti, dnmulti, -hmulti/(nmulti*nmulti));
01273 
01274 #ifdef ORIENTED
01275   rotategradSlaterDet(dhmulti, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
01276 #endif
01277 }

01280 
01281 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
01282 {
01283   int i;
01284   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
01285     q->x[i] = x[i];
01286 }

01289 void MinimizeDONLP2orthogonalvapp(const Interaction* Int, 
01290                                   int j, int par, int ifix, double alpha,
01291                                   angintegrationpara* projpar,
01292                                   const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
01293                                   int nfix, SlaterDet* Qfix,
01294                                   Parameterization* P, Para* q,
01295                                   int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
01296 {
01297 #ifndef MPI
01298   // handler for INT and TERM signals
01299   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
01300   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
01301 #endif
01302 
01303   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
01304   Min.log = log;
01305   Min.logfile = logfile;
01306   Min.Int = Int;
01307   Min.j = j;
01308   Min.par = par;
01309   Min.ifix = ifix;
01310   Min.alpha = alpha;
01311   Min.projpar = projpar;
01312   Min.Const = Const;
01313   Min.nconst = nconst;
01314   Min.nfix = nfix;
01315   Min.Qfix = Qfix;
01316   Min.q = q;
01317   Min.P = P;
01318 
01319   Min.Q = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
01320   P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q); 
01321 
01322 #ifndef MPI
01323   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
01324   if (!setjmp(env))
01325 #endif
01326     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
01327 
01328   fprintf(stderr, "donlp2 terminated because of criterium %d\n",
01329           (int) FORTRAN(o8itin).optite + 11);
01330 
01331   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
01332 }

01334 
01335 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
01336 {
01337 #ifndef MPI
01338   if (sigterminate)
01339     longjmp(env, 1);
01340 #endif
01341 
01342   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01343   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01344 
01345   // nail to center-of-mass
01346   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01347 
01348   double eintr, eortho;
01349 
01350   calcprojectedHamiltonian(Min.nfix,
01351                            Min.Qfix,
01352                            Min.Q,
01353                            Min.Int,
01354                            Min.j, Min.par, Min.ifix,
01355                            Min.projpar,
01356                            &eintr, &eortho);
01357 
01358   *fx = (eortho+Min.alpha*eintr);
01359   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
01360 
01361   fprintf(stderr, "\tme      E = % 8.3f MeV, Eortho = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV,\n", 
01362           hbc*(*fx), hbc*eortho, hbc*eintr);
01363 
01364 }

01367 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
01368 {
01369 #ifndef MPI
01370   if (sigterminate)
01371     longjmp(env, 1);
01372 #endif
01373 
01374   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01375   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01376 
01377   // nail to center-of-mass
01378   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01379 
01380   double eintr, eortho;
01381 
01382   calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.nfix,
01383                                Min.Qfix,
01384                                Min.Q,
01385                                Min.Int,
01386                                Min.j, Min.par, Min.ifix, 
01387                                Min.projpar,
01388                                &eintr, &eortho);
01389 
01390   // add gradient from intrinsic energy
01391 
01392   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01393   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01394   calcgradHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dh);
01395 
01396   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Work.dhmulti, Work.dh, Min.alpha);
01397 
01398   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dhmulti, gradf);
01399   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
01400   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eortho = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01401           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eortho+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eortho, hbc*eintr);
01402 
01403 
01404   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
01405     char logfname[255];
01406     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minovap.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
01407     FILE* logfp;
01408     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
01409       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
01410     } else {
01411       fprintinfo(logfp);
01412       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eortho = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01413               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eortho+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eortho, hbc*eintr);
01414       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
01415       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
01416       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
01417       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
01418       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
01419       fclose(logfp);
01420     }
01421   }  
01422 
01423 }

01439 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
01440 {
01441 #ifndef MPI
01442   if (sigterminate)
01443     longjmp(env, 1);
01444 #endif
01445 
01446   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01447   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01448 
01449   if (*i > 1) {
01450     // nail to center-of-mass
01451     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01452   }
01453 
01454   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01455   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Work.X, hxi);
01456 
01457   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01458           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
01459 
01460   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
01461 }

01464 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
01465 {
01466 #ifndef MPI
01467   if (sigterminate)
01468     longjmp(env, 1);
01469 #endif
01470   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01471   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01472 
01473   if (*i > 1) {
01474     // nail to center-of-mass
01475     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01476   }
01477 
01478   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01479   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01480   zerogradSlaterDet(Work.dh);
01481   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dh);
01482 
01483   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dh, gradhi);
01484   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01485           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Work.dh->val));
01486 }

01488 
01489 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
01490 {
01491   int i;
01492 
01493   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
01494   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
01495   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
01496   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01497     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
01498     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
01499       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
01500       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
01501       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
01502     }
01503     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01504       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
01505       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
01506       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
01507     }
01508     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01509       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
01510         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
01511     }
01512   } else
01513     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
01514   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
01515   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
01516   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
01517   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
01518   FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
01519   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
01520 
01521   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
01522     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
01523 }

01526 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
01527 {
01528   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
01529   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
01530   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
01531 }
